body.name: Bowerbird Clear Toy Blockers for Furniture - Stop Things from Going Under Couch Sofa Bed and Other Furniture - Suit for Hard Surface Floors Only
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 23 hrs 37 mins
features: 3.2"H×16"L×8 pieces.Clear and free cutting for any length.
Fix on hard surface floor such as hardwood ,marble,tile,vinyl,etc. and easy to use.
Non-residue tape technology makes the blockers removable and washable.No harm to your floor.
3.2"H size for the gap above 3” and cuttable for lower gap.
Place the blockers 1"-2" inward the edge of your couch to get the best performance of both blocking and Concealing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product- Found a solution for carpeted homes.
reviews.reviewText: We used these a little different than the manufacturer suggested, but they worked beautifully.We have two dogs that are always losing their balls under the sofa, so these were a perfect idea.One problem... We have carpet, so the sticky bottom would not stick to the floor. So my crafty husband suggested another way. Now, keep in mind that we did NOT follow the rules, and we understood that we could have damaged our furniture, but we have old couches that I would not have been heartbroken if they were damaged. We had no intention of returning these items after our decision was made.We flipped the sofa over, and used a drill with self tapping screws and screwed the plastic straight into the underside of the wood frame. We flipped the plastic upside-down and used the part that is supposed to stick to the floor to drill the holes- so essentially, once the sofa was right side up, the plastic hangs down and skims the top of the carpet.Worked beautifully. We had to use a box cutter to trim a few pieces shorter to make sure the plastic went all the way around the sofa, but no more lost balls!Remember, we went rogue, and the manufacturer would not have been responsible if we messed it all up, but we got lucky! Maybe this review will help someone else with carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, easy to remove!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to keep my cat's toys from getting under the couch, fridge, and stove. They worked perfectly and were very easy to install! I've had them in the same spots on my floor for over three years, but now I'm moving and had to pull them up. I was worried that there would be a lot of residue or damage to my floors (vinyl planks), but there was nothing! If I hadn't pulled them up myself I'd never have known they were ever there. I was so impressed that I came back to write this review! These are also incredibly sturdy and the adhesive is very strong. I have a sleeper sofa, so whenever I move my couch to clean the sleeper apparatus drags against these blockers - I can hear them bending and being dragged under the couch, but they've never once broken or shifted. I can't recommend these enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, but not reusable as description says
reviews.reviewText: The product works great! However, I wanted to reposition one of the pieces since it was too close to the edge of the couch, but when I pulled it up the plastic literally shattered because the adhesive was that strong! Also will need to buy more as I only purchased one box and I have a sectional couch, one box-minus the one that broke when I pulled it up-is barely enough for one side of my couch. As long as you carefully place it before putting in on the floor, and purchase enough, I’d say this is a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very durable, dog broke them in 5 minutes
reviews.reviewText: This was a good idea, however the plastic is quite thin and flimsy. If you just need something because your dog "accidentally" rolls balls under the furniture at times, this will probably work fine. Unfortunately, if you have a demon dog that is a 60lb adolescent german shepherd who for reasons only known to his bizarre little doggy brain has a compulsion to shove balls as far as possible under furniture and then whine and bark incessantly until you get them out only for him to repeat this process again and again, it probably won't work.I realize that was quite a sentence. Suffice it to say if your dog, like mine, REALLY wants to shove toys under furniture, this is unlikely to hold up and the plastic will quickly bend and crack even though the adhesive seems quite solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Parent Must Have
reviews.reviewText: Installation was easy, the double sided tape is very sticky, right now I will consider that a good thing. I’m not sure how easy they will be to remove and whether or not there will be any tape residue remaining on the floor but so far I love them. I have 2 children so if you’re a mom or dad then you understand why these can come in handy. I’m tired of half of the house ending up underneath the couch so I'm hoping these do justice! I used masking tape to line everything up and was also able to easily cut a piece. I will be ordering more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are actually amazing. You can tuck them under the couch so they aren’t visible but they block toys from getting stuck past your reach. And I did a test run with the adhesive on my wood floors and when I removed one after a few days there was no residue. So far these are great!!! My only issue is that when you cut them to fit your exact size of opening they are kinda difficult to cut. I would imagine sharp scissors would doThe trick, I just didn’t happen to have them at the moment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy if you have kids
reviews.reviewText: The sticky part is great, unless you’re sticking it to textured floors or fabric.I have a toddler, these were destroyed within a day. They don’t stay, they don’t keep toys out because they immediately bend back or pop off. Works fine if you are just trying to keep dirt out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small cracks will not make it
reviews.reviewText: Careful when applying, I had a small crack line on arrival and when putting in place it snapped. All the others are fantastic though and very easy to apply.

reviews.reviewTitle: No more toys under the couch!
reviews.reviewText: Not as easy to cut to size as I thought it was but it's a really good product. We have a pull out couch that has the wheels underneath so I just cut smaller pieces so it'd still be able to roll out. Had to move a piece and it was fairly easy to remove and stuck back on the floor no problem. Definitely recommend if you're tired of fishing toys out from under the couch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Se acabó mover el sofá en busca de juguetes
reviews.reviewText: Tengo dos peques y esto nos ayuda a que los juguetes no pasen debajo del sofá, nosotros lo hemos colocado del revés, es decir, pegado en el sofá. De esta manera se puede mover el sofá, habiendo cortado el plástico un poco y así no se pasan los juguetes y si necesitamos moverlo se puede hacer sin problema

Super, nous les avons pris sous notre canapé pour éviter que les jouets de notre fils se perdent en dessous ^^. Et c’est vraiment top ça fait parfaitement son job, on va en racheter pour finir le tour du canapé :). Et comme c’est transparent, ce n’est pas vraiment visible aux yeux des gens donc top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have put these along the bottom of my sofa to stop my kitten getting under there and they have worked amazing easy to apply to my laminate , fast delivery would buy fromThis seller again thank you 😊
